Token.Abstract: This protocol provides delegate methods to receive the updated information related to the remote controller.
Callback function that updates the Remote Controller's current hardware state (e.g. the state of the physical buttons and joysticks).

Parameter.Name: rc
Parameter.Abstract: Instance of the Remote Controller for which the hardware state will be updated.

Parameter.Name: state
Parameter.Abstract: Current state of the Remote Controller's hardware state.

Token.Abstract: Callback function that updates the Remote Controller's current GPS data.

Parameter.Name: rc
Parameter.Abstract: Instance of the Remote Controller for which the GPS data will be updated.

Parameter.Name: state
Parameter.Abstract: Current state of the Remote Controller's GPS data.

Token.Abstract: Callback function that updates the Remote Controller's current battery state.

Parameter.Name: rc
Parameter.Abstract: Instance of the Remote Controller for which the battery state will be updated.

Parameter.Name: state
Parameter.Abstract: Current state of the Remote Controller's battery state.

Token.Abstract: Callback function that gets called when a slave Remote Controller makes a request to a master Remote Controller to control the gimbal using the method requestGimbalControlRightWithCallbackBlock.

Parameter.Name: state
Parameter.Abstract: Information of the slave making the request to the master Remote Controller.

Token.Abstract: Callback function that updates the Remote Focus State, only support Focus product. If the isRCRemoteFocusCheckingSupported is YES, this delegate method will be called.

Parameter.Name: rc
Parameter.Abstract: Instance of the Remote Controller for which the battery state will be updated.

Parameter.Name: state
Parameter.Abstract: Current state of the Remote Focus state.
